src:
Molde slo rivalen - tok langt steg mot seriegull
Molde slo Kristiansund p√• hjemmebane.
02 Nov 2019, 19:28 by NTB

MOLDE - KRISTIANSUND 2‚Äì0

Molde tok l√∏rdag et langt steg mot seriegull i Eliteserien da laget vant 2-0 mot rivalen Kristiansund og revansjerte tapet fra det omvendte oppgj√∏ret 16. mai.
Moldenserne fikk seg en smell forrige helg da de tapte borte mot Rosenborg. De var derfor ekstra revansjesugne da rivalen Kristiansund kom p√• bes√∏k, og 2-3-tapet fra tidligere i sesongen skulle revansjeres.

Ledelsen tok Molde etter et kvarters spill da Leke James spilte vegg med Mattias Mostr√∂m og sistnevnte la ballen p√• tvers til Fredrik Aursnes. 23-√•ringen kunne enkelt sette inn sitt f√∏rste m√•l for sesongen i det √•pne buret.

Leke James satte selv inn 2-0 etter pause og avgjorde kampen til Moldes fordel.


H√∏ydepunkter Molde - Kristiansund 2-0

‚Äì En veldig viktig seier for oss. Tre poeng gir oss positivitet f√∏r de resterende kampene som skal bidra til at vi n√•r m√•let om seriegull. De kom sterkt ut i 2. omgang, s√• m√•let var viktig for √• f√• roet ned kampen, sa Leke James til Eurosport etter kampen.
Trener Erling Moe var full av lovord om spissen etter nok en scoring.

‚Äì Vi har kj√∏rt ham hardt etter en lang skadeperiode, og han har st√•tt godt. Han har det lille ekstra som et godt fotballag trenger. Han gj√∏r andre gode og gj√∏r ting selv, sa Molde-sjefen og mente at seieren til slutt var fullt fortjent.

‚Äì Jeg tror alle vet hvordan tabellen ser ut. Det var ekstra spenning i kroppen, og jeg er forn√∏yd med hvordan vi √•pnet og fram til vi fikk 1-0. Etter det s√• jeg litt feighet som gjorde at vi spilte sidelengs og bakover i stedet for fremover. Dermed kom de litt mer inn, men til slutt var det en fortjent seier der vi skapte de aller st√∏rste sjansene, oppsummerte Moe.
Med Magnus Wolff Eikrem p√• benken fikk Eirik Hestad sjansen i tierrollen bak Leke James. Den sjansen tok han virkelig vare p√• da han serverte James med en lekker stikker etter 59 minutter. Alene med keeper var nigerianeren sikker da han satte inn 2-0 med sin 13. scoring for sesongen.

Molde-stjernen nekter √• snakke f√∏r Kristiansund-kampen er ferdig



Det var flere tette dueller i l√∏rdagens naboduell.üì∑ Svein Ove Ekornesv√•g / NTB Scanpix

Legger press p√• Glimt
James var n√¶re ved √• punktere kampen da han la igjen ballen til Etzaz Hussain med ti minutter igjen p√• klokka. Midtbanespilleren skj√∏t via et KBK-bein og satte keeper Serigne Mor Mbaye helt ut av spill. Ber√∏ringen gjorde at ballen fikk en skru som gjorde at den n√¶rmet stoppet p√• m√•lstreken. Returen satte Aursnes utenfor.

Seieren gj√∏r at Molde n√• har 59 poeng, ni poeng mer enn Bod√∏ Glimt som m√∏ter Haugesund s√∏ndag. Skulle Kjetil Knutsens mannskap avgi poeng der, er det kun syltynn teori som kan frata Molde klubbens f√∏rste seriegull siden 2014.

‚Äì Det er ikke hundre prosent klart, men vi er p√• god vei, konstaterte Aursnes i intervjuet med Eurosport etter kampen.
Molde f√•r bes√∏k av Str√∏msgodset i neste serierunde, f√∏r de skal til Oslo for √• m√∏te V√•lerenga og til slutt m√∏te Bod√∏ Glimt hjemme.
Glimt p√• sin side har igjen Rosenborg og Kristiansund ved siden av Molde.

Molde skriver seg inn i historieb√∏kene ‚Äì skal spille rekordkamp l√∏rdag

Utligningen annullert
Kristiansund b√∏d virkelig opp til kamp og presset til tider hjemmelaget, men de klarte kun √• overliste keeper Andreas Linde ved √©n anledning.
Etter halvtimen spill headet Flamur Kastrati ballen i Molde-m√•let.

Dommer Kai Erik Steen valgte imidlertid √• annullere m√•let for angrep p√• Linde da Aliou Coly gikk for hardt til i kroppen p√• sisteskansen.
text:
Molde beat the rival - took a long step towards serial gold
Molde beat Kristiansund at home.
02 Nov 2019, 19:28 by NTB

MOLD - KRISTIANSUND 2‚Äì0

On Saturday, Molde took a long step towards the series gold in the Elite Series when the team won 2-0 against rival Kristiansund and revamped the loss from the reverse settlement on 16 May.
The Moldovans got a bang last weekend when they lost to Rosenborg. They were therefore extra revenge when the rival Kristiansund came to visit, and the 2-3 loss from earlier in the season was to be revenged.

The lead took Molde after a quarter play when Leke James played wall with Mattias Mostr√∂m and the latter put the ball across to Fredrik Aursnes. The 23-year-old could easily put his first goal of the season in the open cage.

Leke James put themselves up 2-0 after the break and settled the game in favor of Moldes.


Highlights Molde - Kristiansund 2-0

- A very important victory for us. Three points give us positivity before the remaining matches that will help us reach the goal of serial gold. They came out strong in the second half, so the goal was important to calm down the game, Leke James told Eurosport after the game.
Coach Erling Moe was full of praise for the lead after another scoring.

- We have been driving him hard after a long injury period, and he has done well. He has the little extra that a good football team needs. He does other good and does things himself, said the Molde boss, saying that the victory was ultimately fully deserved.

- I think everyone knows what the table looks like. There was extra tension in my body, and I'm happy with how we opened up until we got 1-0. After that I saw some cowardice that made us play sideways and backwards instead of forward. So they came in a bit more, but in the end it was a deserved victory where we created the greatest chances, summarized Moe.
With Magnus Wolff Eikrem on the bench, Eirik Hestad got the chance in the tier role behind Leke James. That was a chance for him to take the lead after 59 minutes, when James got a hand out. Alone with the keeper, the Nigerian was confident as he put in 2-0 with his 13th scoring for the season.

The Molde star refuses to speak until the Kristiansund match is over



There were several close duels in Saturday's neighboring duel.üì∑ Svein Ove Ekornesv√•g / NTB Scanpix

Put pressure on Glimt
James was close to puncturing the match as he left the ball to Etzaz Hussain with ten minutes left on the clock. The midfielder fired via a KBK leg and put keeper Serigne Mor Mbaye completely out of play. The touch caused the ball to get a screw that almost stopped it on the finish line. The return put Aursnes outside.

The victory means that Molde now has 59 points, nine points more than Bod√∏ Glimt who meets Haugesund on Sunday. Should Kjetil Knutsen's crew score points there, only the thinness theory can deprive Molde club's first series gold since 2014.

"It is not 100 percent clear, but we are well on our way," Aursnes noted in the interview with Eurosport after the match.
Molde is visited by the Str√∏msgodset in the next series round, before going to Oslo to meet V√•lerenga and finally to meet Bod√∏ Glimt at home.
Glimpse in turn has Rosenborg and Kristiansund next to Molde.

Molde enters the history books - will play record match on Saturday

The equalization canceled
Kristiansund really offered the match and at times pressed the home team, but they only managed to outlast goalkeeper Andreas Linde on one occasion.
After half an hour of play, Flamur Kastrati headed the ball into the Molde goal.

However, Judge Kai Erik Steen chose to cancel the target of attack on Linde when Aliou Coly went too hard into the body on the last chance.
